attributes.action: reject wirral borough council's proposal to close Guinea Gap Recreation and Woodchurch Leisure Centres and also to transfer Leasowe Recreation Centre from council control to a trust arrangement.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: These are much loved and supported facilities used by young and old alike and they play a vital role in the community.  Everyday the pools are full of people of all shapes and sizes keeping themselves fit and active. The staff are fantastic and there is always a friendly atmosphere whether it's yoga, bowls or kids playing football.   These centres are in areas which desperately need such facilities- isn't it the council's job to provide them?
